name: Fuzzy.Net
short_description:
The project goal is realize a framework able to manipulate knowledge stored via fuzzy set.
In order to do that the framework must allow fuzzy data manipulation and conversion from and to fuzzy set.
summary: A free RBS(Rule based system) that work oon fuzzy set theory.
